text: Norman Graham Hill (15 February 1929 â€“ 29 November 1975) was a British racing driver and two-time Formula One World Champion. He was born in Hampstead, London and died in a plane crash in Arkley, London. His son Damon Hill and Damon's son Josh Hill are racing drivers.
